GetSensorDataRateBase
GetSensorDataRateBase

Contains the logic for the "Get Sensor Data Rate Base" command

Constants
Packet Bytes
CMD_ID

CMD_GET_SENSOR_RATE_BASE  - The MipTypes::Command for this command

FIELD_DATA_BYTE

0x83  - The Data Field Descriptor byte

Functions

Builds the bytes in the command

Returns

A ByteStream that holds the bytes that make up the command

SensorMessageFormat
SensorMessageFormat

Contains the logic for the "Sensor Data Message Format" command

Constants
Packet Bytes
CMD_ID

CMD_SENSOR_MESSAGE_FORMAT  - The MipTypes::Command for this command

FIELD_DATA_BYTE

0x80  - The Data Field Descriptor byte

Functions
buildCommand_get
static ByteStream buildCommand_get()

Builds the bytes for the "get" command

Returns

A ByteStream that holds the bytes that make up the command

buildCommand_set
static ByteStream buildCommand_set(
const 
MipChannels& 
channels,
uint16 
sampleRateBase
)

Builds the bytes for the "set" command.

Parameters
channels
const MipChannels&

The MipChannels holding the channels to be set. This should only contain channels that are in the Sensor (0x80) descriptor set.

sampleRateBase
uint16

The base sample rate for the sensor command set.

Returns

A ByteStream that holds the bytes that make up the command

Exceptions

  • Error: An MipChannel in the channels parameter is not part of the Sensor descriptor set

buildCommand_saveAsStartup

Builds the bytes for the command to save the current settings as the startup settings.

Parameters
Returns

A ByteStream that holds the bytes that make up the command

Exceptions

  • Error: An MipChannel in the channels parameter is not part of the Sensor descriptor set
